name: factory42 GmbH
description:
Cloud Consulting, Process consulting and optimization, cloud software solutions for companies in the services industry (HighTech, IT, Media). 
factory42 GmbH helps you increase the efficiency and flexibility of your customer processes. 
We apply our 13+ years of experience with Salesforce and extensive experience in sales, marketing and service processes, customer intelligence, and social media to implement customer management solutions and generate more satisfied customers.
